title: Crooklyn
creator_credit: Universal Pictures, 40 Acres and a Mule Filmworks, Child Hoods Productions and Spike Lee
brief_description: Make yourself at home with the Carmichael family as they experience one very special summer in their Brooklyn neighborhood that they’ve affectionately nicknamed ‘Crooklyn’. Alfre Woodard stars as a loving, but fiercely independent mother who along with her musician husband Woody (Delroy Lindo) struggles to raise her family in difficult but often wonderful circumstances. Cast also includes David Patrick Kelly, Jose Zuniga, Isaiah Washington, Ivelka Reyes, Spike Lee, N. Jeremi Duru and Zelda Harris.
